walkthroughs.title: Get started with React Native development
walkthroughs.description: Your first steps to set up the environment for React Native development and explore the extension functionality

steps.title: Set up RN development environment
steps.description:
To develop React Native applications in the React Native Tools extension, you need to set up your development environment in accordance with the requirements of React Native.
[Learn more](https://reactnative.dev/docs/environment-setup)

steps.title: Prepare for Expo development
steps.description:
The extension provides functionality for developing Expo applications. To get started, you need to set up the development environment in accordance with the extension requirements.
[Learn more](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-react-native#expo-applications)

steps.title: Prepare for React Native for Windows
steps.description: To develop React Native for Windows applications, you need to set up your dev environment in accordance with the [official requirements](https://microsoft.github.io/react-native-windows/docs/rnw-dependencies).

media.altText: React Native for Windows app view

steps.title: Prepare for React Native for macOS
steps.description: To develop React Native for macOS applications, you need to set up your dev environment in accordance with the [official requirements](https://microsoft.github.io/react-native-windows/docs/rnm-dependencies).

media.altText: React Native for macOS app view

steps.title: Hermes Engine
steps.description:
The Hermes engine is an open source JavaScript engine created by Facebook to optimize building and running React Native applications. It improves app performance and decreases app size.
[Learn more](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-react-native#hermes-engine)

steps.title: Run and Debug your React Native application
steps.description:
Create a debug configuration and start debugging your React Native application.
[Learn more](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-react-native#debugging-react-native-applications)

steps.title: Explore extension features
steps.description:
The extension provides useful features to facilitate the development of React Native applications.
[Learn more](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-react-native#customization)
